Illustration: The Monk, the Monkeys, and the Moo-moo Tree

Kevin asked if I would draw an illustration to complement The Monk, The Monkeys, and the Moo-Moo Tree, a poem that he had written in eigth grade. In exchange, I would receive a watermelon agua fresca. I happily agreed.
